name: Baphomet Doll
description: A doll designed like Baphomet. It permanently increases the character's Crit Resistance by 20 points and cannot be traded.

name: Baphomet Hairband
description: Look, we discovered a cute Baphomet!

name: Baphomet Jr.’s Summer
description: A little to the left, a little more to the right, okay, there it is! If you want to run around with watermelon on the beach, be careful not to be knocked on your ass by the blindfolded man who wants to eat watermelon!
effect: AGI ＋5, 5% chance to Flee magic damage. ＋1% Flee chance for every 50 Flee you have (up to 15%)

name: Baptized Armor
description: This armor, Blessed by the senior priest, Not only protects equipment, but also brings the blessing of the gods.

name: Baptized Armor [1]
description: This armor, Blessed by the senior priest, Not only protects equipment, but also brings the blessing of the gods.

name: Baptized Robe
description: Robes that have been baptized by senior priest can stimulate the magical power of the equipper and continue to bring elemental strength.

name: Baptized Robe [1]
description: Robes that have been baptized by senior priest can stimulate the magical power of the equipper and continue to bring elemental strength.

name: Baptized Shoes
description: These boots have been baptized by senior priests. Although they appear to be bulky, They are actually very light and hold blessings from the gods.

name: Baptized Shoes [1]
description: These boots have been baptized by senior priests. Although they appear to be bulky, They are actually very light and hold blessings from the gods.

name: BASE Potion (L)
description: An ordinary-looking potion. After drinking it, Players can stimulate the potentials inside. Although it tastes strange, it can increase adventurer's BASE EXP by 500,000 points. Sometimes a "L" pattern can be found at the bottom of the bottle.

name: BASE Potion (M)
description: An ordinary-looking potion. After drinking it, Players can stimulate the potentials inside. Although it tastes strange, it can increase adventurer's BASE EXP by 100,000 points. Sometimes a "L" pattern can be found at the bottom of the bottle.

name: BASE Potion (S)
description: An ordinary-looking potion. After drinking it, Players can stimulate the potentials inside. Although it tastes strange, it can increase adventurer's BASE EXP by 5000 points. Sometimes a "L" pattern can be found at the bottom of the bottle.

name: BASE Potion (XL)
description: An ordinary-looking potion. After drinking it, Players can stimulate the potentials inside. Although it tastes strange, it can increase adventurer's BASE EXP by 1, 000, 000 points. Sometimes a "XL" pattern can be found at the bottom of the bottle.

name: Baseball Cap
description: [Listen·Voice of Love and Courage] Concert Souvenir: a cold hat across time and space, across dimensions, connecting races. At least that's what Goblin thinks!

name: Baseball Cap [1]
description: [Listen·Voice of Love and Courage] Concert Souvenir: a cold hat across time and space, across dimensions, connecting races. At least that's what Goblin thinks!
effect: When equipped by Swordsman/Assassin/Priest/Merchant, Atk ＋10,When equipped by wizards, M.Atk ＋10

name: Basic Cook Chest II
description: Once you are able to tell the difference between foods in taste and flavor, You can try some advanced dishes. (Open the pack to find 2-star food)

name: Basic Food Pack II
description: A chef who has learned some cooking skills can be considered as a newcomer to the catering industry. Now he is allowed to try handling some ingredients that are a bit difficult to cook. (Open the pack to find some primary food ingredients)

name: Bastard Sword
description: A double-handed sword is both handy for chopping and stabbing.
